titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the King and Queen at White-Hall on the 19th day of October, 1690, being the day of thanksgiving for His Majesties preservation and success in Ireland by the Right Reverend Father in God, Gilbert Lord Bishop of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Half title: The Bishop of Salisbury's thanksgiving-sermon for the King's preservation in Ireland.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
